# Precise.ai
> Programmatic transparency & control platform. Eliminate 35–47% of data waste. Valence-signed proof of ROAS lift.

## About
Precise.ai eliminates programmatic data waste and provides cryptographic proof of media performance. Built by Adam Helfgott, founder of MadHive.

## Products
- **Govern**: Veto garbage segments before spend
- **Valence**: Cryptographic proof of contribution
- **Ingest**: First-party data onboarding with segment scoring

## Key Stats
- 35–47% data waste eliminated
- ANA Q2 2025: $26.8B lost globally (36.5% from data inefficiency)
- 29–41% average ROAS lift
- <48 hour audit turnaround

## Pages
- / - Main site with product overview and free waste audit
- /local - Local CTV agencies landing page
- /cdp - CDP partner integration page

## Contact
- Email: hello@precise.ai
- Local agencies: local@precise.ai
- CDP partners: partners@precise.ai

## Free Audit
Request a free waste audit at https://precise.ai/#contact
48 hours. No sales call unless you ask.
